name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 65,848 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: The gland releases pheromones that attract a Ceaseless Swarm of insects to surround you. Taking damage has a high chance to retaliate against attackers, inflicting 86,619 Nature damage over 6 sec and reducing damage dealt to you by 26,213.
